metadata.title: CVE-2018-5684 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Libav through 12.2, there is an invalid memcpy call in theff_mov_read_stsd_entries function of libavformat/mov.c. Remote attackerscould leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service(segmentation fault) and program failure with a crafted avi file.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
